name: lore-cli
author: Storcery
description: Command Line Interface for Lore (A convention driven framework for React + Redux applications)

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clean:node:group1: npm run clean:node:lore-cli-core && npm run clean:node:lore-generate && npm run clean:node:lore-generate-collection
scripts.clean:node:group2: npm run clean:node:lore-generate-component && npm run clean:node:lore-generate-generator && npm run clean:node:lore-generate-model
scripts.clean:node:group3: npm run clean:node:lore-generate-new && npm run clean:node:lore-generate-reducer
scripts.clean:node: npm run clean:node:local && npm run clean:node:group1 && npm run clean:node:group2 && npm run clean:node:group3
scripts.install:group1: npm run install:lore-cli-core && npm run install:lore-generate && npm run install:lore-generate-collection
scripts.install:group2: npm run install:lore-generate-component && npm run install:lore-generate-generator && npm run install:lore-generate-model
scripts.install:group3: npm run install:lore-generate-new && npm run install:lore-generate-reducer
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:group1 && npm run install:group2 && npm run install:group3
scripts.test:group1: npm run test:lore-cli-core && npm run test:lore-generate && npm run test:lore-generate-collection
scripts.test:group2: npm run test:lore-generate-component && npm run test:lore-generate-generator && npm run test:lore-generate-model
scripts.test:group3: npm run test:lore-generate-new && npm run test:lore-generate-reducer
scripts.test: npm run test:group1 && npm run test:group2 && npm run test:group3
